name: Minimal Rogue
description:
Minimal Rogue is an ascii old school roguelike. It was made in 5 days for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1). Reach the level 6 and defeat the Boss to win the game.

wasd/arrows to move and attack

spacebar to wait 1 turn

"i" for inventory

you can turn autoloot on in help menu "h"
